subject: Regarding shipping.
description_text:
Hello!

I brought a pedal pair and haptics + power supply.

I choose express shipping, but as I can see its not gonna be delivered
within 8 days. Seems like a bit false advertising.

It was for a birthday for my nephew. And currently I'm afraid I will have
to go to his bday empty handed.

Is there anything we can do?

Order no: Order #SSN3886

[image: Logo] <https://www.my-company.com/>
Ignas Žiūraitis
Off-site SEO Specialist
e: ziuraitis.ignas@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Ignas Žiūraitis,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse experienced a temporary stock shortage and has only recently completed restocking, which delayed your shipment. Here is your tracking link. Delivery is expected around the 6th. https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326634732DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353

Hey!

Yeah I understand, but accessories will be when? Its still in China's
customs?

Let me know what we can do about it.

[image: Logo] <https://www.my-company.com/>
Ignas Žiūraitis
Off-site SEO Specialist
e: ziuraitis.ignas@gmail.com
Hi Ignas Žiūraitis,  The VAM Pro Linear Motor is expected to arrive around the 7th. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047091732644

Understood.

Seems like the problem will still accur, since I ordered on 27th last month
I felt that 7 days shipping will be 7 days shipping and your website will
not miss-lead.

Since my nephew birthday is Friday, its gonna be 50/50 if I will have gift
for him. I feel that miss-leading in your website and you should inform
your clients that you are expecting longer delivery times.

Can I expect compensasion because if you wouldnt miss-lead on your website
I would have taken regular shipping which costed me 20 bucks more.

LMK.




[image: Logo] <https://www.my-company.com/>
Ignas Žiūraitis
Off-site SEO Specialist
e: ziuraitis.ignas@gmail.com


On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 1:09 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Ignas Žiūraitis,  Don't worry, we will refund your extra shipping fee.

Okay nice! Thanks!


[image: Logo] <https://www.my-company.com/>
Ignas Žiūraitis
Off-site SEO Specialist
e: ziuraitis.ignas@gmail.com


On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 1:16 PM support@simsonn.com

Hey guys!

I received the pedals but haptic package on one site it says its being
returned to you, in another website it says its been delivered to local
courier company, maybe you have any information?

As well I am waiting what we talked before :/

Lmk!

[image: Logo] <https://www.my-company.com/>
Ignas Žiūraitis
Off-site SEO Specialist
e: ziuraitis.ignas@gmail.com

Hi，Ignas Žiūraitis，       I just checked the shipping status for you. There are two packages in total, and one of them has already arrived.     ​

to land.

I wanted to ping about refund of shipping fees we talked about before.

Hi Ignas Žiūraitis,  There is no issue with your compensation; we will process it for you next week. However, as it is currently peak season, the high volume at both the courier and customs has caused delays, which affected the overall timing. We sincerely apologize.
